name: Battle of the Vores
description: Once upon a time, herbivores and carnivores were living peacefully in the Sikeland. However, one day, the carnivores broke the peace treaties by eating one of the herbivore tribe members. As a member of the Super Revolutionary Army Vores, known as VORES, Rabbito will raid the whole island according to keikaku (which means plan), and alongside his nakamas (which means friends). Help Rabbito to successfully raid the island!
